name: BombiniBot - for Teaching Robotics and Programming to Kids

A LEGO® compatible robotics toy for all kids.

name: Personal Robot

ONE ROBOT PER KID.
mBot is the easiest educational robot for kids to learn programming, Arduino and robotics.

name: The T100: A Game-Changing Underwater Thruster
blurb: An efficient, rugged, affordable underwater thruster to propel the future of marine robotics and ocean exploration.
